summary: The Pit River Land Transfer Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of the Interior to take specific federal and fee land in California, known as the Four Corners land, into trust for the benefit of the Pit River Tribe. The bill defines the land, prohibits gaming on the transferred land, and outlines administrative procedures. The Secretary of Agriculture is tasked with providing a land survey.  The land will be considered part of the Pit River Tribe Reservation.
